description: This Python script is part of a code generation system that processes JSON-RPC schema definitions to generate C++ header files, enumeration code, version info, and stub implementations. It includes functions to parse schemas, generate API headers, and orchestrate code generation steps.

methods.name: CreateApiHeader(log, source_name, path, headers)
methods.description: Generates a C++ header file for JSON-RPC API, including necessary headers and documentation comments.

methods.name: Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
methods.description: Main function that processes a JSON schema to generate C++ header files, enums, version info, stubs, and RPC implementations based on provided flags.

ctags.name: Create
ctags.pattern: /^def Create(log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs/
ctags.signature: (log, schema, source_file, path, additional_includes, generate_classes, generate_stubs, generate_rpc)
